definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Extract inerrorformation from customers' technical specifications for sub-assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 從客戶技術規範中提取本地裝配需要的信息。

sentences.english: All Technical Circulars (TR) mentioned in our offer have been enclosed.
sentences.chinese: 所有上述的技術規範都作爲附件提供。

sentences.english: Research and development of Northern Shaanxi White Cashmere Goat Raising and Reproduction Techniques.
sentences.chinese: 制定陝北白絨山羊新品種全舍飼養殖技術規範及標準。

sentences.english: The use of the OSP confirms that that these two specifications can be implemented for free.
sentences.chinese: OSP的使用確認了這兩種技術規範都能夠免費實現。

sentences.english: Check operater quantity whether to match technique norm and technique contract or not.
sentences.chinese: 檢查施工質量是否符合技術規範以及技術合同。

sentences.english: to enact and implement technical standard and criterion.
sentences.chinese: 制定技術規範及標準，並組織實施。

sentences.english: The certification to this Technical Specification includes customer-specific requirements if any.
sentences.chinese: 技術規範的認證包括顧客特殊要求。

sentences.english: Determination of the suitability of this specification for that purpose is the responsibility of the purchaser.
sentences.chinese: 本技術規範適宜性的確定責任在於買方。

definition: see 推進器|推进器[tui1 jin4 qi4]
